main event: A bright light was observed traveling northeast across the sky in Silver Spring, Maryland on 11 November 1962.
interesting points: The light was observed by a radar operator., The observation was categorized as ground-radar., The object was reported as a potential balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon., There was a significant time lag between the sighting and the receipt of the notification., A schoolboy allegedly made a time exposure photograph of the UFO.
witness description: a radar operator and a schoolboy who may have photographed the event
